title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4022.18 - Examination of horses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4022.18 - Examination of horses

State Regulations

The stewards have power at any time to order an
examination, by such person or persons as they think fit, of any horse entered
for a race or that has run in a race. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4022.18

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
